verses.roman:
śuni' prabhu kahe,--"corā dili daraśana
āya, āya, āji tora karimu daṇḍana"

synonyms: śuni'-hearing; prabhu kahe—Lord Nityānanda Prabhu said; corā—thief; dili daraśana—you have come to see Me; āya ā ya—come here, come here; āji—today; tora—your; karimu—I shall do; daṇḍana—punishment.
translation: Hearing this, Lord Nityānanda Prabhu said,"You are a thief. Now you have come to see Me. Come here, come here. Today I shall punish you!"
